selected_quotes: Love this! New randomized study finds volunteering improves cardiovascular/metabolic health of teens
fensomkevin Great Q -- the study randomly assigned students to control/experimental groups to reduce bias
Volunteering helped kids lose weight. Read this JAMA study: #weightloss #2017
Neat result! Effect of Volunteering on Risk Factors for CVD in Adolescents

citation.abstract: The idea that individuals who help others incur health benefits themselves suggests a novel approach to improving health while simultaneously promoting greater civic orientation in our society. The present study is the first experimental trial, to our knowledge, of whether regular volunteering can reduce cardiovascular risk factors in adolescents.
citation.title: Effect of Volunteering on Risk Factors for Cardiovascular Disease in AdolescentsA Randomized Controlled TrialVolunteering and Cardiovascular Disease Risks

news.title: Older Adults Who Volunteer Can Reduce Their Risk for Hypertension By 40%
news.summary: Older adults who volunteer can reduce their risk for hypertension by 40 percent, adding to the list of other benefits that come with helping the community out.

news.title: The Physiological Power of Altruism
news.summary: In the fight against the disease that will kill one of every four people you know, most scientists studying cardiovascular epidemiology at Harvard School of Public Health are focusing on usual suspects like cholesterol, obesity, and cardiac structure.

news.title: Why doing good can do you good
news.summary: We feel good when we do a good deed, so there must be a psychological benefit to helping others? But how can we know for sure? The best way to study the health benefits of kind deeds is to look at studies of volunteering.

news.title: Volunteering Is Good For You — Literally
news.summary: You might not get paid for your time, but there are tons of benefits to volunteering: A sense of purpose, the chance to learn something new, and of course, the opportunity to do something for other people without expecting anything back.
